head.title: Rail Merger Unlikely After a Court Ruling

hedline.hl1: Rail Merger Unlikely After a Court Ruling

block.p: The $6 billion merger of Burlington Northern Santa Fe and Canadian National Railway will probably be called off now that a federal appeals court has upheld a temporary ban on railroad consolidations.
The combination, which would have been the largest in railroad history, would have created a vast freight network that would crisscross the United States and Canada and offer service in Mexico.
